title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 442/96 of 11 March 1996 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92, No 1913/92, No 2254/92, No 2255/92, No 2312/92 and No 1148/93 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands, the Azores, Madeira and the French overseas departments with beef and veal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 442/96 of 11 March 1996 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1912/92, No 1913/92, No 2254/92, No 2255/92, No 2312/92 and No 1148/93 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands, the Azores, Madeira and the French overseas departments with beef and veal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Annexes II and IIa to Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 are hereby replaced by Annex I hereto.
2. Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 1913/92 is hereby replaced by Annex II hereto.
3. Annex II to Regulations (EEC) No 2254/92, No 2255/92 and No 2312/92 is hereby replaced by Annex III hereto.
4. The aid set out in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 is hereby replaced by the amount set out in Annex IV hereto.
5. Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 1913/92 is hereby replaced by Annex V hereto.
6. Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 is hereby replaced by Annex VI hereto.
7. The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1148/93 is hereby replaced by Annex VII hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
